Set.Text: Each source of [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble and [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and Mountains can be worked for +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
Stone Works increases City [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. It is especially effective if the City has access to [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble, [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone, or Mountains.
40% of [ICON_FOOD] Food is carried over after a new [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen is born. All Mountains worked by this city produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.

The Aqueduct decreases the amount of [ICON_FOOD] Food a city needs to increase in size by 40%. It also can bring water down from Mountains, increasing the [ICON_FOOD] Food yield of those panels when worked.

+25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold from [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections. All Mountains worked by this city produce +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built within 2 tiles of a Mountain that is inside your territory.
